parameters.value: {'name': '万能验证码', 'request': {'method': 'get', 'path': '/api/admin/get/almighty/code', 'headers': {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (HTML, like Gecko) ""Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36', 'deviceId': '1254', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, 'params': 'none', 'extract': {'smsCode': '$.data'}, 'validate': [{'equal_to': {'$.code': 1}}]}}
